Title: January 2015
Content: 23*p45044a02328*turn over      *(iii) an experiment was carried out to determine the value of kc for this reaction.    0.120 mol of ethanoic acid was added to 0.220 mol of ethanol.    5.00 cm3 of 1.00 mol dm3 hydrochloric acid was added as a catalyst.  this contains 0.278 mol of water.    the mixture was left to reach equilibrium.    the mixture was titrated with 1.00 mol dm3 sodium hydroxide, which reacted with both of the acids.    the titre was 45.0 cm3.   use these data to determine the value for kc.(6)
